title: Perform an evaluation
content_markdown:
Version: 8.3Creatio Financial Services CRM
On this page
The Finserv Customer Management app lets you configure and run various identity evaluations directly from the UI, for example, KYC (Know Your Customer), AML (Anti-Money Laundering), etc. You can integrate external services using no-code tools or use the out-of-the-box manual evaluation process available in Creatio for contacts and documents. Learn more: [Web services](https://academy.creatio.com/docs/8.x/no-code-customization/category/web-services).
## Create an evaluation​
### Create an evaluation for a contact​
1. **Open** the **Contacts** section.
2. **Open** the needed record.
3. **Go to** the **Compliance and risk monitoring** tab.
4. **Click** ![btn_add.png](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Finance_and_Banking/create-an-evaluation/btn_add.png) in the **Evaluation history** expanded list. This opens a mini page.
5. **Select** the evaluation process to launch.
6. **Save the changes**.
**As a result** , Creatio will add the evaluation history record that has a predefined set of checks.
### Create an evaluation for a document​
Fig. 1 Document evaluation
![Fig. 1 Document evaluation](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Finance_and_Banking/create-an-evaluation/scr_document_evaluation.png)
1. **Open** the **Documents** section.
2. **Open** the needed record.
3. **Go to** the **Evaluations** tab.
4. **Click** ![btn_add.png](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Finance_and_Banking/create-an-evaluation/btn_add.png) in the **Evaluation history** expanded list. This opens a mini page.
5. **Select** the evaluation process to launch.
6. **Save the changes**.
**As a result** , Creatio will add the evaluation history record that includes both the list of checks and the connected document.
## Process an evaluation​
Evaluation works similarly for both contacts and documents. To process the evaluation history record:
1. **Open** the **Evaluation history** record.
2. **Specify** the general information about the evaluation.
Parameter| Value  
---|---  
Contact| Contact of the person under evaluation.  
Status| Overall evaluation status, For example, "Not started," "Approved," "Rejected."  
Risk score| Overall score that reflects the potential customer risk.  
Evaluation date| Actual date of the evaluation.  
Due date| Expiration date of the evaluation.  
Due date| Expiration date of the evaluation.  
Evaluator| Contact of the employee who performed the evaluation.  
Comment| Any important information regarding this evaluation.  
3. **Process** the list of checks in the **Checks** list. Specify the following for each check in the list:
Parameter| Value  
---|---  
Status| Current status of the check, for example, "Not started," "Approved," "Rejected."  
Risk score| Score for this particular check.  
Comment| Any important information regarding this check.  
4. **Add** a new document (optional).
1. Go to the **Documents** tab.
2. Click **Add document**.
3. Select one or more documents associated with the contact.
4. Click **Select**.
5. **Evaluate** the added document (optional).
Select the document on the left. This causes all needed information to appear on the right.
Parameter| Value  
---|---  
Evaluation document status| Current status of the document, for example, "Not started," "Approved," "Rejected."  
Evaluation document comment| Any important information regarding this document.  
Properties| List of properties of the selected document.  
Files| List of attachment of the selected document.  
6. **Change** the status on the **General information** tab once you complete the checks and documents.
7. **Click** **Save**.
8. **Change** the **Verification status** field on the contact page and specify the actual verification status.
**As a result** , you will complete the evaluation. The document evaluation record will be linked to the document automatically, but you have to link the contact evaluation record to the document manually.
